title: Installation issue: gcc@7.3.0
body:
```console
$ spack install gcc@7.3.0
==> libsigsegv is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/libsigsegv-2.11-enmfiy65cyf6tcq3mfdcxxqktevdeg4i
==> m4 is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/m4-1.4.18-poljmoz4ig37l2yjsgds4x3o4gv26lj2
==> pkgconf is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/pkgconf-1.5.4-eefhoyq47u5gb3khzdtzexesktpnxjoa
==> ncurses is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/ncurses-6.1-bc4ky734znnothwocr7zugbxihnayqrg
==> readline is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/readline-7.0-3k7o6qtou5zti4a6qi2kuyc534r7tnar
==> gdbm is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/gdbm-1.18.1-eapfwh5whwijvv2iwcslgwfkivtrmt3b
==> perl is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/perl-5.26.2-fxtnsycxdetgayji4q7ntabku5ftmty7
==> autoconf is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/autoconf-2.69-prgvoinmuprbg2kxgitxar7fshopxnc4
==> automake is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/automake-1.16.1-lbgbc24jhwrurpnwlhgm5auha5pnh5w2
==> libtool is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/libtool-2.4.6-yrhbmxst4r6unzzqqa6jbqa76wvza2as
==> gmp is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/gmp-6.1.2-szwwcekvlmlo2ndhblhwn3w2egag4pu2
==> isl is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/isl-0.18-f2xzkhjnod3qiq5belcmzb4se7rpnwjd
==> mpfr is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/mpfr-3.1.6-z4b5lytomknekt5psyrbyimvp5xhjqxs
==> mpc is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/mpc-1.1.0-g57t2bt2tzbmcxi6yyfsof6pei7w7l4h
==> zlib is already installed in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-scientific6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/zlib-1.2.11-pixubdjhd3p36x4upg7f5l3mlyi77h5r
==> Installing gcc
==> Searching for binary cache of gcc
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for gcc found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/var/spack/cache/gcc/gcc-7.3.0.tar.xz
==> Staging archive: /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/var/spack/stage/gcc-7.3.0-c4wpk23r6iene2z3fa47c5mkn7c3ulbd/gcc-7.3.0.tar.xz
==> Created stage in /cfs/gfs2/home/users/aryczkowski/tmp/spack/var/spack/stage/gcc-7.3.0-c4wpk23r6iene2z3fa47c5mkn7c3ulbd
==> Ran patch() for gcc
==> Building gcc [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j4'
==> Error: This platform lacks a functioning sem_open implementation, therefore, the required synchronization primitives needed will not function, see issue 3770.
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux dn 2.6.32-573.12.1.el6.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Dec 15 08:24:23 CST 2015 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux$ lsb_release -d
Description:    Scientific Linux release 6.4 (Carbon)
``` 
- `~/.spack/packages.yaml`:
```
packages:
  glib:
    version: [2.55.1]
```
- `~/.spack/linux/compilers.yaml`
```
compilers:
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: scientific6
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc
      cxx: /usr/bin/g++
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@4.4.7
    target: x86_64
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: scientific6
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc34
      cxx: null
      f77: null
      fc: null
    spec: gcc@3.4.6
    target: x86_64
```

### Additional information

Sometimes the issue benefits from additional details. In these cases there are
a few things we can suggest doing. First of all, you can post the full output of:
```console
$ spack spec --install-status <spec>
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   gcc@7.3.0

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   gcc@7.3.0%gcc@4.4.7~binutils languages=c,c++,fortran ~piclibs~strip arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]      ^gmp@6.1.2%gcc@4.4.7 arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]          ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@4.4.7 arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]              ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@4.4.7 patches=3877ab548f88597ab2327a2230ee048d2d07ace1062efe81fc92e91b7f39cd00,c0a408fbffb7255fcc75e26bd8edab116fc81d216bfd18b473668b7739a4158e,fc9b61654a3ba1a8d6cd78ce087e7c96366c290bc8d2c299f09828d793b853c8 +sigsegv arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]                  ^libsigsegv@2.11%gcc@4.4.7 arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]              ^perl@5.26.2%gcc@4.4.7+cpanm patches=0eac10ed90aeb0459ad8851f88081d439a4e41978e586ec743069e8b059370ac +shared+threads arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]                  ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@4.4.7 arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]                      ^readline@7.0%gcc@4.4.7 arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]                          ^ncurses@6.1%gcc@4.4.7~symlinks~termlib arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]                              ^pkgconf@1.5.4%gcc@4.4.7 arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]          ^automake@1.16.1%gcc@4.4.7 arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]          ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@4.4.7 arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]      ^isl@0.18%gcc@4.4.7 arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]      ^mpc@1.1.0%gcc@4.4.7 arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]          ^mpfr@3.1.6%gcc@4.4.7 patches=66a5d58364113a21405fc53f4a48f4e8 arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
[+]      ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.4.7+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-scientific6-x86_64 
```
